ETH 2.0 AMA with Danny Ryan

Danny Ryan is a researcher at the EF and is one of the lead coordinators behind the ETH 2. movement!

Listen to Danny's talk at ETH Online! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wEh4u5a-43o&t=1539s

Check out ETH Online! https://ethglobal.online/#schedule
